segments.source_content:
---
title: Chaos Mesh Release Cycle
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: This document is focused on Chaos Mesh developers and contributors who need to create an enhancement, issue, or pull request which targets a specific release milestone.

translations.zh-hant: 本文件主要面向 Chaos Mesh 開發者與貢獻者，這些人員需要建立針對特定發布里程碑的增強功能、議題或拉取請求。

segments.source_content: ## Roles

translations.zh-hant: ## 角色

segments.source_content: ### Contributors/Developers

translations.zh-hant: ### 貢獻者/開發者

segments.source_content: Contributors are expected to participate in the release cycle with the following forms:

translations.zh-hant: 貢獻者應以下列形式參與發布週期：

segments.source_content: - participant discussions of new features/enhancements collection

translations.zh-hant: - 參與新功能/增強功能的討論收集

segments.source_content: - contribute with codes/docs for Chaos Mesh

translations.zh-hant: - 貢獻 Chaos Mesh 的程式碼/文件

segments.source_content: - help to prune feature if required

translations.zh-hant: - 必要時協助精簡功能

segments.source_content: As a contributor, the only 2 things you need to notice are:

translations.zh-hant: 身為貢獻者，您僅需注意兩件事：

segments.source_content: - you might be asked to complete your uncompleted work, or prune them from the release branch.

translations.zh-hant: - 您可能會被要求完成未完成的工作，或將其從發布分支中精簡移除

segments.source_content: - your PR might not be merged into master quickly during "Code Freeze"

translations.zh-hant: - 在「程式碼凍結」期間，您的拉取請求可能無法快速合併至主分支

segments.source_content: ### Release Manager

translations.zh-hant: ### 發布管理員

segments.source_content: "Release Managers" is an umbrella term that encompasses the set of Chaos Mesh contributors responsible for maintaining release branches, tagging releases, and building/packaging Chaos Mesh.

translations.zh-hant: 「發布管理員」泛指負責維護發布分支、標記版本以及建構/打包 Chaos Mesh 的貢獻者群體。

segments.source_content: Release Manager are expected to:

translations.zh-hant: 發布管理員應執行以下事項：

segments.source_content: - collect "new features/enhancements" as a GitHub Issue

translations.zh-hant: - 收集「新功能/增強功能」並建立 GitHub 議題

segments.source_content: - create and maintain `vX.Y.0` GitHub Milestone

translations.zh-hant: - 建立並維護 `vX.Y.0` GitHub 里程碑

segments.source_content: - schedule and hold the required meeting

translations.zh-hant: - 安排並主持必要會議

segments.source_content: - keep maintaining the tracking documentation for next coming release

translations.zh-hant: - 持續維護下個發布的追蹤文件

segments.source_content: - communicate with contributors asking for help to complete/prune the unfinished features/docs; Or prune them by yourself if we lost the communication with contributors.

translations.zh-hant: - 與貢獻者溝通，請求協助完成/精簡未完成功能或文件；若與貢獻者失聯則自行精簡

segments.source_content: - cut the release branch

translations.zh-hant: - 切出發布分支

segments.source_content: - draft the Release Notes for the minor version

translations.zh-hant: - 草擬次要版本的發布說明

segments.source_content: - release the alpha, beta, minor versions

translations.zh-hant: - 發布 alpha、beta 及正式次要版本

segments.source_content: - keeping enriching release-related documents

translations.zh-hant: - 持續完善發布相關文件

segments.source_content: ### Becoming Release Manager?

translations.zh-hant: ### 如何成為發布管理員？

segments.source_content: Chaos Mesh committers and maintainers would nominate new release managers at about the 1st week of the new release cycle, the nomination should be published in slack channel #chaos-mesh-maintainers. And they would be selected if there are no more than half the number of oppositions. At last, we would announce the release managers on the document website and slack channel [#project-chaos-mesh](https://cloud-native.slack.com/archives/C0193VAV272).

translations.zh-hant: Chaos Mesh 的提交者與維護者將在新發布週期約第 1 週提名新任發布管理員，提名應發布於 Slack 頻道 #chaos-mesh-maintainers。若反對票未超過半數則獲選，最終我們會在文件網站與 Slack 頻道 [#project-chaos-mesh](https://cloud-native.slack.com/archives/C0193VAV272) 公告發布管理員名單。

segments.source_content: ## Versioning Scheme and Timeline

translations.zh-hant: ## 版本規範與時程

segments.source_content: - Chaos Mesh would release a minor version `vX.Y.0` every 8 weeks.

translations.zh-hant: - Chaos Mesh 每 8 週發布一次次要版本 `vX.Y.0`

segments.source_content: - Chaos Mesh would release a preview version(`vX.Y.0.alpha/beta-W`, W>=0) every at least 2 weeks.

translations.zh-hant: - Chaos Mesh 至少每 2 週發布一次預覽版本 (`vX.Y.0.alpha/beta-W`, W>=0)

segments.source_content: - Chaos Mesh would release a bugfix/patch (`vX.Y.Z`, Z>0) version as required.

translations.zh-hant: - Chaos Mesh 將視需求發布錯誤修正/補丁版本 (`vX.Y.Z`, Z>0)

segments.source_content: ## Release Phases

translations.zh-hant: ## 發布階段

segments.source_content: There would be 3 phases in a cycle of release:

translations.zh-hant: 每個發布週期包含三個階段：

segments.source_content: - Normal Dev (Week 1-5)

translations.zh-hant: - 常規開發期 (第 1-5 週)

segments.source_content: - Code Freeze (Week 6-7)

translations.zh-hant: - 程式碼凍結期 (第 6-7 週)

segments.source_content: - Release Week (Week 8)

translations.zh-hant: - 發布週 (第 8 週)

segments.source_content: ### Normal Dev

translations.zh-hant: ### 常規開發期

segments.source_content: Things happened during "Normal Dev":

translations.zh-hant: 此階段發生事項：

segments.source_content: - selecting new Release Managers

translations.zh-hant: - 遴選新任發布管理員

segments.source_content: - collecting "new features/enhancements" would be carried with the next release

translations.zh-hant: - 收集將納入下個版本的新功能/增強功能

segments.source_content: - create the `vX.Y.0` milestone if not existed

translations.zh-hant: - 若尚未建立則創建 `vX.Y.0` 里程碑

segments.source_content: - coding and documenting

translations.zh-hant: - 編寫程式碼與文件

segments.source_content: - releasing alpha versions every 2 weeks

translations.zh-hant: - 每 2 週發布 alpha 版本

segments.source_content: ### Code Freeze

translations.zh-hant: ### 程式碼凍結期

segments.source_content: Things happened during "Code Freeze":

translations.zh-hant: 此階段發生事項：

segments.source_content: - blocking the merging of all unrelated PRs

translations.zh-hant: - 禁止合併所有不相關的拉取請求

segments.source_content:
- reviewing "new features/enhancements" would be carried with the next release
  - finish or prune the unfinished features
  - the documents are ready, at least have a related open issue on chaos-mesh/website

translations.zh-hant:
- 審查將納入下個版本的「新功能/增強功能」
  - 完成或修剪未完成的功能
  - 文件準備就緒，至少在 chaos-mesh/website 上有相關的開放議題

segments.source_content: - cutting branch `release-X.Y`

translations.zh-hant: - 建立分支 `release-X.Y`

segments.source_content: - releasing beta versions

translations.zh-hant: - 發布 beta 版本

segments.source_content: - preparing the Release Notes

translations.zh-hant: - 準備版本發布說明

segments.source_content: - create the `vX.Y+1.0` milestone

translations.zh-hant: - 建立 `vX.Y+1.0` 里程碑

segments.source_content: - merging bugfix if required

translations.zh-hant: - 合併錯誤修復（若需要）

segments.source_content: - documenting about the new release

translations.zh-hant: - 撰寫關於新版本的說明文件

segments.source_content: Phase "Code Freeze" would start at Week 6, and finish at branch `release-X.Y` created.

translations.zh-hant: 「程式碼凍結」階段將於第 6 週開始，並在建立 `release-X.Y` 分支時結束。

segments.source_content: When we are in "Code Freeze", PRs which are not related to the coming minor release would be prevented from merging into master. Only PRs related to the coming release could be merged into the master branch.

translations.zh-hant: 當處於「程式碼凍結」期間，與即將發布的次要版本無關的 PR 將禁止合併至 master 分支。僅與該版本相關的 PR 可合併至 master 分支。

segments.source_content: Release Managers would communicate with contributors to ask them for finishing or pruning the unfinished features. Sometimes Release Managers would prune them by themselves if we lost the communication with the contributors.

translations.zh-hant: 版本經理將與貢獻者溝通，要求其完成或修剪未完成功能。若與貢獻者失聯，版本經理有時會自行修剪這些功能。

segments.source_content: Once all the unfinished features are completed or marked as "need prune", the release manager would cut the `release-X.Y` branch. The merging process for all PRs back to normal.

translations.zh-hant: 當所有未完成功能皆完成或標記為「需修剪」後，版本經理將建立 `release-X.Y` 分支。所有 PR 的合併流程隨即恢復正常。

segments.source_content: Once uncompleted features are pruned, Release Manager would release the first beta version. After that, only bug fixes would be cherry-picked into the release branch. Release Manager could release more beta versions if we have updates on the release branch.

translations.zh-hant: 未完成功能修剪後，版本經理將發布首個 beta 版本。此後僅錯誤修復會被揀選至發布分支。若發布分支有更新，版本經理可發布更多 beta 版本。

segments.source_content: Release Manager should start to prepare Release Notes after the beta version is released.

translations.zh-hant: 版本經理應在 beta 版本發布後開始準備版本發布說明。

segments.source_content: ### Release Week

translations.zh-hant: ### 發布週

segments.source_content: Things happened during "Release Week":

translations.zh-hant: 「發布週」期間發生事項：

segments.source_content: - merging emergency bugfix or vulnerabilities fix if required

translations.zh-hant: - 合併緊急錯誤修復或漏洞修補（若需要）

segments.source_content: - releasing the minor version artifacts (helm charts, container images, and others)

translations.zh-hant: - 發布次要版本成品（Helm charts、容器映像檔等）

segments.source_content: - releasing the minor version documentation

translations.zh-hant: - 發布次要版本文件

segments.source_content: Release Manager would release the `vX.Y.0` in this week.

translations.zh-hant: 版本經理將於本週發布 `vX.Y.0` 版本。
